dict.acceptation: 基本的；必要的；本质的；精华的；
必需品；基本要素；必不可少的东西；

sent.orig: What is essential and not essential in sense certainty itself.
sent.trans: 感性确定性自身里本质的东西和非本质的东西。

sent.orig: This also guaranteed Sa Debei displays stably essential essential factor.
sent.trans: 这也是保证萨德贝稳定发挥的必要要素。

sent.orig: Whitening essential oil Contain Lemon, Lavender, Rose, Sage, Patchouli and Geranium essential oils-Wheat germ oil.
sent.trans: 含柠檬、熏衣草、玫瑰、鼠尾草、广藿香、天竺葵、小麦胚芽油等成分。

sent.orig: Do not apply citrous essential oils, such as orange or lemon essential oil, before sunbath.
sent.trans: 甜橙、柠檬等柑橘类精油，不宜在使用后进行日光浴。

sent.orig: Eye contour essential oil Contain Rose, Lavender, Fennel, Sandalwood andRosa essential oils-Hazelnut oil.
sent.trans: 含玫瑰、熏衣草、茴香、檀香、玫瑰草、棒果油等成分。
